Inspo.q: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.
Inspo.h:
“No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.” —
Albert Einstein

Inspo.q: As you think, so shall you become.
Inspo.h:
“As you think, so shall you become. ” —
Bruce Lee

Inspo.q: Happiness is a choice and a skill and you can dedicate yourself to learning that skill and making that choice.
Inspo.h:
“Happiness is a choice and a skill and you can dedicate yourself to learning that skill and making that choice.” —
Naval Ravikant

Inspo.q: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
Inspo.h:
“Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.” —
Mother Teresa

Inspo.q: It is under the greatest adversity that there exists the greatest potential for doing good, both for oneself and others.
Inspo.h:
“It is under the greatest adversity that there exists the greatest potential for doing good, both for oneself and others.” —
Dalai Lama

Inspo.q: Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.
Inspo.h:
“Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.” —
Og Mandino

Inspo.q: Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
Inspo.h:
“Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.” —
Mark Twain

Inspo.q: Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.
Inspo.h:
“Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.” —
Celestine Chua

Inspo.q: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
Inspo.h:
“You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.” —
Dr. Seuss

Inspo.q: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
Inspo.h:
“It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ” —
Brian Tracy

Inspo.q: Growth comes at the point of resistance.
Inspo.h:
“Growth comes at the point of resistance.” —
Josh Waitzkin

Inspo.q: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Inspo.h:
“You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.” —
A.A. Milne

Inspo.q: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
Inspo.h:
“Whoever is happy will make others happy too.” —
Anne Frank

Inspo.q: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
Inspo.h:
“Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.” —
Babe Ruth

Inspo.q: I wasn't brave, I just didn't have time to be scared.
Inspo.h:
“I wasn't brave, I just didn't have time to be scared.” —
Amelia Earhart

Inspo.q: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
Inspo.h:
“Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.” —
Ralph Marston

Inspo.q: Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.
Inspo.h:
“Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker. ” —
Zig Ziglar

Inspo.q: Every experience is a lesson. Every loss is a gain.
Inspo.h:
“Every experience is a lesson. Every loss is a gain.” —
Sathya Sai Baba
